abstract: Colombia's Congress approves revised peace accord with Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia, country's largest rebel group; passage of accord is likely last obstacle for troubled agreement's ratification, which was obstructed by rejection of earlier version of accord in national referendum.

headline.print_headline: Colombia Congress Approves Pact With FARC
headline.main: Colombia’s Congress Approves Peace Accord With FARC

snippet: The vote was most likely the final hurdle in ratifying the troubled agreement whose earlier version had been rejected in a referendum this fall....
lead_paragraph: The vote was most likely the final hurdle in ratifying the troubled agreement whose earlier version had been rejected in a referendum this fall.
